fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Position correction applied to the hexapod in the optical x-direction.
fields.name: hexapod_x

fields.doc: Position correction applied to the hexapod in the optical y-direction.
fields.name: hexapod_y

fields.doc: Position correction applied to the hexapod in the optical z-direction.
fields.name: hexapod_z

fields.doc: Angle correction applied to the hexapod with respect to the optical x-axis.
fields.name: hexapod_u

fields.doc: Angle correction applied to the hexapod with respect to the optical y-axis.
fields.name: hexapod_v

fields.doc: Angle correction applied to the hexapod with respect to the optical w-axis.
fields.name: hexapod_w
